  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1179</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Yerusha1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Yerusha1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Yerusha1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Yerusha1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Yerusha1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Yerusha1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Yerusha1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Two-lesson unit on Bereshit 15: 1-8. learners learn about God's promise to grant Avram a child. Intensive text-study. Includes worksheets.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bereshit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">god</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">avram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sarai</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible story</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei-Lektion Maßeinheit auf Bereshit 15: 
1-8. erlernen Anfänger über Versprechung des Gottes, Avram ein
Kind zu bewilligen. Intensiv Text-studieren Sie. Enthält 
Bogen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité de Deux-leçon sur Bereshit 15 : 
1-8. les étudiants se renseignent sur la promesse de Dieu 
d'accorder à Avram un enfant. Intensif texte-étudiez. 
Inclut des tableaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade da Dois-lição em Bereshit 15: 
1-8. os learners aprendem sobre a promessa do deus de conceder a
Avram uma criança. Intensive texto-estude. Inclui folhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità di Due-lezione su Bereshit 15: 1-8. 
i principianti imparano circa la promessa del dio assegnare a Avram un
bambino. Intenso testo-studi. Include i fogli di lavoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονάδα δύο-μαθήματος σε Bereshit 15: 1-8. οι αρχάριοι μαθαίνουν για την υπόσχεση του Θεού να 
χορηγήσει σε Avram ένα παιδί. Εντατική κείμενο-μελέτη. 
Περιλαμβάνει τα φύλλα εργασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">unidad de la Dos-leccio'n en Bereshit 15: 
1-8. los principiantes aprenden sobre la promesa del dios de 
conceder a Avram un niño. Intensivo texto-estudie. 
Incluye las hojas de trabajo.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
